mapper.select:
select count(1) from .oms_order t WHERE t.created_by_order IS NULL AND t.state NOT IN ('INCOMPLETE','INVISIBLE') and t.site_id <> 'chongzhiSite'
and t.submitted_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

select count(distinct sg.shipping_group_id) amount from .oms_order o inner join .oms_shipping_group sg on sg.order_id=o.order_id left join .oms_payment_transaction t on t.trans_order_id=o.order_id left join .oms_payment_transaction t1 on t1.trans_order_id=sg.shipping_group_id left join .oms_payment_group pg on pg.payment_group_id=nvl(t.payment_group_id,t1.payment_group_id) where o.created_by_order is null and pg.state = 'SETTLED'
and o.submitted_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

select count(1) amount from .oms_order o inner join .oms_shipping_group sg on sg.order_id=o.order_id where o.created_by_order is null and sg.state='NO_PENDING_ACTION'
and o.submitted_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

select count(1) amount from .oms_order o inner join .oms_shipping_group sg on sg.order_id=o.order_id where o.created_by_order is null and o.site_id not in ( 'wapRushBuySite','wapGroupOnSite','wapSite','wapVirtualCardSite','wapEntityCardSite','wapPresellSite','wapGiftSite','gomeLotteryWapSite','discountTicketWapSite','discountTicketWap','haiwaigouWapSite', 'mobileSite','mobileGroupOnSite','mobileRushBuySite','mobileVirtualCardSite','mobileEntityCardSite','mobilePresellSite','mobileGiftSite','haiwaigouMobileSite' )
and o.submitted_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

select count(1) amount from .oms_order o inner join .oms_shipping_group sg on sg.order_id=o.order_id where o.created_by_order is null and o.site_id in ( 'wapRushBuySite','wapGroupOnSite','wapSite','wapVirtualCardSite','wapEntityCardSite','wapPresellSite','wapGiftSite','gomeLotteryWapSite','discountTicketWapSite','discountTicketWap','haiwaigouWapSite' )
and o.submitted_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

select count(1) amount from .oms_order o inner join .oms_shipping_group sg on sg.order_id=o.order_id where o.created_by_order is null and o.site_id in ( 'mobileSite','mobileGroupOnSite','mobileRushBuySite','mobileVirtualCardSite','mobileEntityCardSite','mobilePresellSite','mobileGiftSite','haiwaigouMobileSite' )
and o.submitted_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
SELECT mc.id id,mc.`name` name,mc.x_axis xaxis,mc.y_axis yaxis from mo_map_coordinate mc

SELECT mp.mo_count amount from mo_payratio mp where 1=1 and mp.type='all'
and #{startTime} >= mp.start_time && #{endTime} <=mp.end_time

SELECT mp.mo_count amount from mo_payratio mp where 1=1 and mp.type='onLine'
and #{startTime} >= mp.start_time && #{endTime} <=mp.end_time

SELECT COUNT(distinct g.shipping_group_id) amount FROM .oms_shipping_group G LEFT join .oms_item_details ids on ids.shipping_group_id=g.shipping_group_id left join .oms_sku os on os.commerce_item_id=ids.commerce_item_id left join .gome_sku_shop ss on ss.sku_id=os.sku_id LEFT JOIN .ord_header T ON T.Order_Num =G.SHIPPING_GROUP_ID AND t.current_status <> 'MS' left join .oms_order o on g.order_id=o.order_id WHERE g.GOME_STATE <> T.current_status and t.current_status not in ('MS','SRV') AND t.current_status_date BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE) - 30 AND sysdate - 1 / 24 and g.state_update_date < sysdate-1/24/2 and not exists(select 'x' from .oms_shipping_group sG inner JOIN .ord_header h ON h.Order_Num =sG.SHIPPING_GROUP_ID where h.current_status='RT' and sg.gome_state='CL' and sg.state='REMOVED' and h.order_num=g.shipping_group_id ) and ss.shop_no is null
and g.state_update_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT COUNT(distinct g.shipping_group_id) amount FROM .oms_shipping_group G LEFT JOIN .oms_shop_info si ON si.shipping_group_id=g.shipping_group_id LEFT JOIN tbl_sub_order so ON so.sub_order_id =G.SHIPPING_GROUP_ID left join .oms_order o on g.order_id=o.order_id WHERE si.shop_id IS NOT NULL AND g.GOME_STATE <> so.order_state AND so.order_state NOT IN ('CWC','CWS') AND o.submitted_date > to_date('2016-05-30 23:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AND so.order_state_time < trunc(SYSDATE)-1 AND not exists(select * from .oms_shipping_group sg inner JOIN tbl_sub_order tso ON to_char(tso.sub_order_id)=sG.SHIPPING_GROUP_ID where tso.order_state IN ('RCC','DFC') and sg.gome_state='CL' and sg.state='REMOVED' and sg.shipping_group_id=g.shipping_group_id ) and not exists(select 'x' from .oms_shipping_group sg inner JOIN tbl_sub_order tso ON tso.sub_order_id =sG.SHIPPING_GROUP_ID where tso.order_state IN ('EX') and sg.gome_state='3AP' and sg.shipping_group_id=g.shipping_group_id )
and g.state_update_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT COUNT(1) amount from (select ro.id,ro.order_id,ro.state,oh.current_status, ro.created_date from .ROMS_ORDER ro, .ord_header oh where ro.id = oh.order_num
and oh.order_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
and oh.quotation_prefix in ('PR', 'RO', 'EO') ) c left join .ROMS_SHIPGROUP rsg ON c.id = rsg.return_request_id LEFT JOIN .roms_item ri ON ri.return_request_id=rsg.return_request_id LEFT JOIN .oms_sku os ON os.commerce_item_id=ri.ancestor_item_id LEFT JOIN .gome_sku_shop ss ON ss.sku_id=os.sku_id left join .oms_order oo ON oo.order_id = c.order_id where ss.shop_no is null and c.created_date > trunc(sysdate)-60 and rsg.gome_state <> c.current_status AND rsg.gome_state <> 'RPS' AND c.current_status <> 'MS' and not exists(select 'x' from .ROMS_SHIPGROUP d where d.return_request_id=rsg.return_request_id and d.return_shipping_method='4' and d.gome_state in ('DL','CL'))
and not exists (select 'x' from .ord_header oh left join .ord_detail od on od.order_num=oh.order_num left join .ROMS_SHIPGROUP d on oh.order_num=d.return_request_id where d.gome_state='CL' and oh.current_status='R2C' and oh.order_num=rsg.return_request_id)

SELECT COUNT(1) amount FROM .oms_order DO INNER JOIN .oms_shipping_group SG ON DO.ORDER_ID = SG.ORDER_ID WHERE DO.STATE = 'PROCESSING' and sg.state not in ('NO_PENDING_ACTION','PENDING_MERCHANT_ACTION','REMOVED') AND (sg.GOME_STATE = 'CO' OR sg.GOME_STATE IS NULL) AND DO.CREATED_BY_ORDER IS NULL AND DO.SITE_ID NOT IN ('chongzhiSite', 'gomeLotterySite', 'gomeLotteryAppSite','depositSite','gomeMovieSite','mobileGiftSite','wapGiftSite') AND DO.LAST_MODIFIED_DATE < (SYSDATE - 1 / 24 / 2)
and do.submitted_date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT COUNT(1) amount FROM .oms_order DO INNER JOIN .oms_shipping_group SG ON DO.ORDER_ID = SG.ORDER_ID INNER JOIN .ord_header tl ON tl.order_num = sg.SHIPPING_GROUP_ID WHERE DO.STATE = 'PROCESSING' and sg.state not in ('NO_PENDING_ACTION','PENDING_MERCHANT_ACTION','REMOVED') AND (sg.GOME_STATE = 'CO' OR sg.GOME_STATE IS NULL) AND DO.CREATED_BY_ORDER IS NULL AND DO.SITE_ID NOT IN ('chongzhiSite', 'gomeLotterySite','gomeLotteryAppSite', 'depositSite','gomeMovieSite','mobileGiftSite','wapGiftSite')
and DO.LAST_MODIFIED_DATE between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT COUNT(1) amount FROM .oms_order DO INNER JOIN .oms_shipping_group SG ON DO.ORDER_ID = SG.ORDER_ID INNER JOIN tbl_sub_order t2 ON to_char(t2.sub_order_id)= sg.SHIPPING_GROUP_ID WHERE DO.STATE = 'PROCESSING' and sg.state not in ('NO_PENDING_ACTION','PENDING_MERCHANT_ACTION','REMOVED') AND (sg.GOME_STATE = 'CO' OR sg.GOME_STATE IS NULL) AND DO.CREATED_BY_ORDER IS NULL AND DO.SITE_ID NOT IN ('chongzhiSite', 'gomeLotterySite','gomeLotteryAppSite', 'depositSite','gomeMovieSite','mobileGiftSite','wapGiftSite')
and DO.LAST_MODIFIED_DATE between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT COUNT(1) amount FROM .roms_order C LEFT JOIN .ROMS_SHIPGROUP rg on rg.return_request_id=c.id LEFT JOIN (select ch.return_request_id,ch.Gome_State_Date from .ROMS_SG_HISTORY ch where ch.Gome_State_Date is not NULL and ch.gome_state='OD' ) his ON his.return_request_id=rg.return_request_id WHERE rg.gome_state='OD'
and his.Gome_State_Date between #{startTime} and #{endTime}

SELECT COUNT(1) amount FROM .oms_order DO INNER JOIN .oms_shipping_group SG ON DO.ORDER_ID = SG.ORDER_ID WHERE DO.STATE = 'PROCESSING' AND sg.GOME_STATE = 'OD' AND DO.CREATED_BY_ORDER IS NULL AND DO.SITE_ID NOT IN ('chongzhiSite', 'gomeLotterySite', 'gomeLotteryAppSite', 'depositSite','gomeMovieSite')
and DO.LAST_MODIFIED_DATE between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
